questions.question: What is the dominant color of the container's main body?
What is the apparent material of the product's packaging?
What is the overall shape of the product container?
Describe the texture of the visible container surface.
What color is the text on the product's label?
What is the primary type of information displayed on the label?
Is the container's lid visibly sealed or tamper-evident?
Does the container have any noticeable markings beyond text?
What is the apparent size of the product container (relative to a standard item)?
Is the container transparent or opaque?
What is the apparent weight of the container (by visual estimation)?
Are there any images or icons on the container's label?
Does the product packaging show a clear brand name or logo?
What is the apparent finish of the product container?
Does the container have a noticeable curve or any significant indentations?
